div.p: Abstract ancestor of all concrete content types. A unit of content that makes up a composition - e.g., a clinical statement in a patient record, a simple or composite action is a knowledge document, a catalog entry in a catalog.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
